survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' satisfaction with their work-from-home technology setups and identify areas for improvement to enhance productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which devices do you primarily use for work-from-home? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: Which devices do you primarily use for work-from-home? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please specify any other devices you use for work-from-home not listed above.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Keep the field open-ended to capture unique responses.

script.question_text: Please specify any other devices you use for work-from-home not listed above.
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q2.

questions.question_text: How has your internet connection impacted your work-from-home experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a clear single-choice scale to assess reliability.

script.question_text: How has your internet connection impacted your work-from-home experience?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What type of internet connection do you primarily use for work?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for less common connection types.

script.question_text: What type of internet connection do you primarily use for work?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please specify any other type of internet connection you use for work not listed above.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q5.
questions.client_notes: Keep the field open-ended to capture unique responses.

script.question_text: Please specify any other type of internet connection you use for work not listed above.
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q5.

questions.question_text: Does your employer provide any technology or equipment for your home office?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/some options to assess employer support.

script.question_text: Does your employer provide any technology or equipment for your home office?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: If your employer provides technology or equipment, please list the items you received.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if 'Yes' or 'Some, but not all needed' is selected in Q7.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific items provided.

script.question_text: If your employer provides technology or equipment, please list the items you received.
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if 'Yes' or 'Some, but not all needed' is selected in Q7.

questions.question_text: What additional technology or equipment would improve your work-from-home experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather specific suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional technology or equipment would improve your work-from-home experience?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties while working from home?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to assess common technical issues.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties while working from home?
